00038     void
00039     Neuron::setOwnerThread(unsigned _thread)
00040     {
00041         if(0 > _thread || _thread > 100)
00042             throw Exception::RangeMismatch()<<"Neuron::setOwnerThread(): thread must be between 0 and 100\n";
00043 
00044         ownerThread =_thread;
00045     } //setOwnerThread

00059     list<Link>::iterator
00060     Neuron::findLink(NeuronIter _to, Link::Direction _direction)
00061     {                                                                                
00062         list<Link>::iterator iter = links.begin(),                                   
00063         result = links.end();                                   
00064         for(; iter != links.end(); ++iter)                                           
00065         {                                                                            
00066             if(iter->getToIter() == _to && iter->getDirection() == _direction)                     
00067             {                                                                        
00068                 if( result != links.end() ) //Multiple parallel links exist          
00069                     throw Exception::MultipleOccurance()<<"findLink(): detected parallel links\n";
00070                 else                                                                              
00071                     result = iter;                                                                
00072             }                                                                                     
00073         }                                                                                         
00074 
00075         if( result == links.end() )
00076             throw Exception::ObjectNotFound()<<"findLink(): can't find required link\n";
00077 
00078         return result;
00079     } //findLink
